data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Kyenjojo, Uganda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kyenjojo, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Kyenjojo, Uganda who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Kyenjojo, Uganda.
Jesus, purify the 7,790 believers in the state of Kyenjojo to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Gujarati people.
Father, we ask for 4 new simple churches in the state of Kyenjojo, Uganda. Place a simple church in every community of the 23,500 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Kyenjojo to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary:
the state of Kyenjojo, Uganda has a population of 23,500.

We estimate Kyenjojo has 7,790 people who might know Jesus, 11,735 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,975 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Kyenjojo, Uganda that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

location.name: Kyenjojo
